    • upload

      void upload(InputStream inputStream, javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType archiveType, WorkFlow workflow, String action) throws VitamException
      Upload compressed SIP as stream
      Parameters:
      archiveType - is a format (mime type) of SIP (should be zip ,tar, tar.gz or tar.bz2)
      inputStream - SIP
      workflow - workflow information
      action - Identifier
      Throws:
      VitamException - if stream is null
